turn.2: The Lover (The Office) "The Lover" is the 7th episode of the sixth season of the American comedy series "The Office" and the show's 107th episode overall.
turn.4: It was written by Lee Eisenberg and Gene Stupnitsky and directed by Eisenberg.
turn.6: It originally aired on October 22, 2009 on NBC.
turn.8: The series—presented as if it were a real documentary—depicts the everyday lives of office employees in the Scranton, Pennsylvania, branch of the fictional Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.
turn.10: In this episode, Jim and Pam return from their honeymoon and discover that Michael is dating Pam's mother, which infuriates her.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: Meanwhile, Dwight tries to install a recording device in Jim's office, by giving him a wooden mallard as an apology for their long rivalry.
